title: Valsad–Jodhpur Weekly Express
text:
The 19055/19056 Valsad - Jodhpur Weekly Express is an <a href="Express%20trains%20in%20India">express</a> train belonging to <a href="Western%20Railway%20zone">Western Railway zone</a> that runs between <a href="Valsad%20railway%20station">Valsad</a> and <a href="Jodhpur%20Junction%20railway%20station">Jodhpur Junction</a> in <a href="India">India</a>. It is currently being operated with 19055/19056 train numbers on a weekly basis.
On 29 January 2019, Upgraded rake of Western Railway under ‘Project Utkrisht’ with beautiful interiors & many passengers friendly new features was introduced in Valsad - Jodhpur Weekly Express.
Service.
The 19055/Valsad - Jodhpur Weekly Express has an average speed of 54 km/hr and covers 754 km in 13h 55m.
The 19056/Jodhpur - Valsad Weekly Express has an average speed of 53 km/hr and covers 754 km in 14h 15m.
Route and halts.
The important halts of the train are:
Coach composite.
The train has standard ICF rakes with max speed of 110 kmph. The train consists of 20 coaches :
Traction.
Both trains are hauled by a <a href="Electric%20Loco%20Shed%2C%20Vadodara">Vadodara Loco Shed</a> based <a href="WAP%204E">WAP-4E</a> electric locomotive from <a href="Valsad">Valsad</a> to <a href="Ahmedabad">Ahmedabad</a>. From <a href="Ahmedabad">Ahmedabad</a> trains are hauled by a <a href="Diesel%20Loco%20Shed%2C%20Vatva">Vatva Loco Shed</a> based <a href="WDM%203A">WDM-3A</a> diesel locomotive uptil <a href="Jodhpur">Jodhpur</a>.
Rake Sharing.
The train shares its rake with 22909/22910 <a href="Valsad-Puri%20Superfast%20Express">Valsad-Puri Superfast Express</a>.
